metadata.title: CVE-2020-24619 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In mainwindow.cpp in Shotcut before 20.09.13, the upgrade check misuses TLS because of setPeerVerifyMode(QSslSocket::VerifyNone). A man-in-the-middle attacker could offer a spoofed download resource.

notes.note: sbeattie> upgrade check should probably be disabled in debian/ubuntu packaging

criterions.comment: shotcut package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
